DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect 20 mg bazedoxifene comparison placebo bone mineral density 6 month therapy population postmenopausal Asian woman .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety Efficacy Bazedoxifene Postmenopausal Asian Women
DOC.criteria: 1 . Generally healthy Asian woman 45 year age old least 1 year postmenopausal 2 . Subjects must qualify one follow category ( b ) : 1 . Greater 1 year less 5 year postmenopausal least one ospeoporosis risk factor 2 . Equal great 5 year postmenopausal BMD Tscore lumbar spine femoral neck 1 2.5 ( value 1 2.5 acceptable ) least one osteoporosis risk factor 1 . One ( 1 ) osteoporotic vertebral fracture ( T4 L4 ) 2 . BMD Tscore lumbar spine femoral neck le 2.5 3 . Past history active nontraumatic venous thromboembolic event , include deep vein thrombosis , pulmonary embolism , retinal vein thrombosis
